meanings.definition: A genus of bacteria that includes several species causing brucellosis in animals and humans.
meanings.sent1: Brucellae are tiny bacteria that can make animals and humans sick.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian identified the brucellae as the cause of the illness in the cows.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous dog blamed the missing treats on the sneaky brucellae hiding in the pantry.
meanings.sent4: Like invisible invaders, brucellae silently spread illness among the farm animals.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the brucellae looked like tiny troublemakers causing chaos.
